name: People’s Institute of Rural Development
briefDescription: People’s Institute of Rural development [PIRD] is a registered public trust, established in 1983 inspired by the historic call “go to the villages” given by Gandhiji. PIRD has focussed on issues confronting the marginalized sections of rural society. PIRD is an activist organisation working at the grassroots across villages of Latur, Osmanabadand, Parbhani, and Nanded districts of Maharashtra.
